feedback: Strong understanding of React concepts. Could improve on performance optimization knowledge.

responses.response: Controlled components have form data handled by React components, while uncontrolled components store form data in the DOM.
responses.feedback: Excellent explanation of the core difference.

responses.response: To optimize React: use React.memo for component memoization, virtualize long lists, lazy load components, and minimize state updates.
responses.feedback: Good points on optimization techniques. Consider mentioning code splitting as well.
